title: Ep - 88 - REALITY STEVE – BACHELOR SPOILERS
description:
For nine years Reality Steve has been spoiling seasons of The Bachelor, The Bachelorette, and Bachelor in Paradise. He discusses with Kate why the current Bachelor Arie Luyendyk will have one of the most talked about seasons of the franchise and how the show has changed over the years. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

www.loveandknuckles.com
